ModMetaData.name: Cyanobot's Genes
ModMetaData.author: cyanobot
ModMetaData.description:
20 new genes and 2 new xenotypes to add to your gene pool. Requires Biotech.
Genes: - Bodyfeeder : increased hemogen gain from human flesh, reduced from other sources - Obligate Cannibal : unable to survive on anything that isn't human flesh - Carnivore/Hypercarnivore/Herbivore/Strict Herbivore : reduced/no nutrition + ill effects from eating inappropriate food - Light Fur : cosmetic short fur, gets wet when it rains - Tabby : cosmetic stripy markings - Slit Pupils : cosmetic cat/snake eyes - Cat Tail : stripy tail grants bonuses similar to Nimble trait - Prey Drive : recreation from hunting - Stealthy : + hunting stealth - Psychopathic - Asocial : cannot Social, unaffected by insults - Pack Bond : relationship bonus between allies who share the gene - Stoic/Unstable : mental break threshould up/down - Easily/Rarely/Never Bored : recreation need up/down/absent
Xenotypes: - Kitlin : Useless cat people. Quick, agile and good at hunting, but spend most of their time sleeping or playing. - Biodrone : Disciplined, emotionally dampened supersoldiers, not quite as potent as Hussars but far more controllable. Exceptionally stoic and resilient to harsh conditions, but inept at most other tasks.
